comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: In Bain's Collection picture www.loc.gov/pictures/item/ggb2004001724/ Also seen in Prominent Personalities of the Mexican Revolution, The Mexican Revolution Photo Gallery. That picture is located at Hotel Coliseo, Mexico City, on June 24, 1911. They identify standing from left to right: Tirso Espinosa, Gildardo Magaña, M. Mejía, Abram Martínez, Jesús Jáuregui and Rodolfo Magaña. Seated, in the same order: Eufemio Zapata, Emiliano Zapata y Próculo Capistrán. Is it possible this picture hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.15839 could be located in Hotel Coliseo on June 24,1911? Dr. Roberto Duarte Plastic Surgeon
